name: Buffalo Chicken Strips
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Place two Cooling Racks on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner; lightly brush racks with oil to prevent sticking.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, whisk together 1 tbsp seasoning, brown sugar, ketchup, and vinegar. Add chicken and toss to coat.

Place coating mix and remaining 1 tbsp seasoning in a shallow dish; mix to combine. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken pieces one at a time, rotating dish and pressing mixture on chicken fillets to coat.
Place chicken fillets on racks, leaving some space between each piece. Bake 18–20 min until golden and cooked through.
tips: For a veggie side, swap chicken with cauliflower florets. Roast until tender.
No Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix? No problem! Simply toss chicken fillets with Buffalo Seasoning; bake, then toss in prepared buffalo sauce (Step 2 above).
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced carrots and celery sticks, 2 tbsp prepared Ranch Dip, and 1⁄2 cup oven fries.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Cooling Rack (Set of 2)
summary: These space-saving cooling racks are an absolute must-have for every at-home baker or chef.
